fields.name: admin_logo
fields.label: Choose Logo Image
fields.description: Choose the logo to display in the admin section.

fields.name: pagination_size
fields.label: Pagination Count
fields.description: Maximum number of items returned by default in most content area.

fields.name: debug
fields.label: Show Debug Info
fields.description: Override main configuration debug setting - does not affect error reporting, only shows CMS debug output.

fields.name: ga_key
fields.label: Google Analytics Key
fields.description: Google Analytics key - if left blank, analytics will not be loaded.

fields.name: og_enabled
fields.label: Use OpenGraph
fields.description: Make OpenGraph [social media title/image/description] page settings available in back-end and render in front-end template.

fields.name: rc_sitekey
fields.label: Google reCAPTCHA Site Key
fields.description: If left blank, reCAPTCHA will not be used on the site. Currently we support the V2 I'm Not A Robot version.

fields.name: rc_secretkey
fields.label: Google reCAPTCHA SECRET Key
fields.description: Please keep this safe and never show it on the front-end.
